EmailTemplate.description: IN USE When Program Manager rejects Funding opportunity, then email is sent to Funding Opportunity Owner
EmailTemplate.name: FAP - Program Manager rejects Funding opportunity email to FO Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Funding Opportunity #{!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification email that the Funding Opportunity # {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} has been rejected.
Hello {!Announcement__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you the Funding Opportunity # {!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c} for Program {!Announcement__c.Program__c} has been Rejected.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
